reviewText: I can remember watching this when I was about 7,scared the crap out of me..I cried like a baby it freaked me out so much.
When I first saw this flick I was  about 10 years old and it scared the S__t out of me! unfortunately  the news now is generally scarier than this movie. But its still an interesting  flick!
Considering how few dollars were put into this, they did an okay job and made the points they wanted to. More mics and lights, and I would have liked it more.
I did not make it through 15 minutes of this heavy handed bummer.

Have not been able to watch it yet as it does not work in a DVD player even though it says it is a DVD.  DVD player says it is an unsupported format????  Very disappointed as I really wanted to watch this movie.

Founded in 1993, Chandler, AZ. based AFA ENTERTAINMENT wholesales and retails PD motion pictures in both full and widescreen formats. Cover art is often repros of vintage movie posters. They also provide a transfer to DVD service for videotapes and 8mm home movies. Their film dubs offer no commentary, deleted scenes, subtitles or other bonus features. Quality of these unrestored transfers is based on condition of source material, which can vary from very good to only fair.

.
THIS IS NOT A TEST is a nearly obscure 'B' grade Atomic Age frighter with a script that would make Rod Serling proud.

Here, a small number of motorists stopped on a mountain road by a 4 AM roadblock learn that a nuclear attack is imminent. They huddle in a big rig trailer and pray for survival. It doesn't end happily.

This chilling story has time to explore the reactions of individual humans to what appears to be the approaching end of their lives. Behaviors are as different as fingerprints. The avaricious worry about money and possessions, the kind-hearted show concern only for others, and the cowardly don't muster any deep-down courage. Seamon Glass as the no-nonsense state trooper takes a page out of Robert Ryan's playbook. He's cold, stentorian and somewhat wooden while trying to maintain order during a monumental crisis.

In preparing their flimsy trailer for fallout shelter duty, hard life-or-death decisions must be made, yet in the end these may all just be distracting ways of avoiding the unspeakable, that tomorrow may not come for any of them.

A definite must-see!

.
Parenthetical number preceding title is a 1 to 10 IMDb viewer poll rating.

(5.6) This is Not a Test (1962) - Seamon Glass/Thayer Roberts/Aubrey Martin/Mary Morlas/Michael Greene/Alan Austin/Carol Kent/Norman Winston/Ron Starr/Don Spruance
